article:
Twelve years ago yesterday, my mother gave birth to the most beautiful girl.   _  , we
were later given the  _  that this little girl, who was
three and a half months old, would only have 14 days on the earth. It's hard to
understand what kind of  _  you have when you
find out that you're  _  something that you don't even know.
    As time went on, the number of days kept growing, which gave us   _  . When the doctors said that
we could take her home, that was  _  reality hit. We had no  _  .
    I am from a small town with   _  hospitals, but when you don't have money, you just don't  have it. My
mother tried for days to get the money, but nothing  came up  each
time. A caseworker  was even doing her best. It's   _  that it almost
felt as if we had to  _    a baby from the hospital.
    One day the caseworker walked into her boss's office to   _  again. As she walked out,  _  down yet again, out of nowhere a man walked up to her. He  _  her a handful of money and said, "Please give this to the lady in  _  , so she can take her daughter home." She looked down at her hand with
tears in her eyes. As she looked back up to thank him, he was  _  .
They searched all over that hospital and he was no where to be  _  .
    Thanks to the guy that I will   _  know, we could take home that  _  baby girl that was only
given 14 days to live, and celebrated her 12thbirthday yesterday. I
am grateful to this man and feel that his act of  _  should
be shared with everyone.
